thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convinent!
thread.title_full: Convinent! - Review of Holiday Inn Express Manhattan Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Amesk
title: Convinent!
text:
A great hotel if you're shopping, visiting, dining, drinking or just in town for 'local' business. It's close to everything you need, and not a hassle to get in and out of. Parking is close (We did not park, used Amtrak) Many, many dining options are steps away.
The staff is courteous and helpful, and the rooms are clean and quiet. Definitely on the list of 'will stay agains'.
